definitions: relating to or expressed in terms of a parameter or parameters.
shortDefinitions: relating to or expressed in terms of parameter or parameters

definitions: assuming the value of a parameter for the purpose of analysis

examples.text: variables with normal distribution were compared by means of parametric tests

shortDefinitions: assuming value of parameter for purpose of analysis

definitions: relating to or denoting a process in which amplification or frequency conversion is obtained using a device modulated by a pumping frequency, which enables power to be transferred from the pumping frequency to the signal.
shortDefinitions: of process in which amplification or frequency conversion is obtained using device modulated by pumping frequency
